sections.title: Project Context & Goals
sections.goal: Understand the overall objectives, constraints, and stakeholder landscape for Nimbus Observability.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through the main goals for Nimbus Observability in the current build phase?
What regulatory or compliance constraints influence your observability design?
Who are your primary stakeholders and how do their priorities differ?

sections.title: Current Architecture & Tooling
sections.goal: Explore the existing telemetry pipelines, integrations, and decision criteria for tooling.
sample_questions: Which parts of the OpenTelemetry pipeline are already implemented and which are pending?
How are SLOs defined and where are they stored or tracked?
Can you describe any runbooks or RFCs that have shaped the current architecture?

sections.title: Incident Response & Analytics
sections.goal: Investigate how incident analytics are performed, and how observability data supports oncall teams.
sample_questions: How do you currently triage alerts to avoid fatigue?
What does RB-OBS-033 cover in practice during an incident?
Can you share a recent example where incident analytics led to a design change?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify links between Nimbus Observability and other Novereon projects or systems.
sample_questions: How does Nimbus Observability integrate with Helios Datalake or Titan DR?
Are there shared SLO definitions or dashboards across projects?
What challenges have you faced in aligning telemetry formats across teams?

sections.title: Risks, Trade-offs & Future Plans
sections.goal: Uncover decision rationales, risk assessments, and roadmap considerations.
sample_questions: What trade-offs did you make between data granularity and storage cost?
Can you walk me through a decision where risk mitigation shaped the implementation?
Looking ahead, what are the biggest risks and opportunities you foresee for Nimbus Observability?
